summary: This is a female redguard preset inspired by the talented Alycia Debnam Carey as Commander Lexa from the 100.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys!
As a big "the 100" and Alycia Debnam Carey fan I thought why not combine that and my love for Skyrim to make a character that looks like the 100's Commander Lexa played by ADC.
I've spent a while on getting her to show up exactly as I wanted and now that I'm finally okay with how it turned out - why not upload?

So here she is: A hopefully lore conform Commander Lexa of the Twelve Clans.

Race: Redguard
Class: Best played as a light armor build with two 1h weapons!

Hope you'll like it! :)
---

[u]You will need these mods to get her to show up exactly as in the screenshots:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] by expired
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No more blocky faces[/url] by Xenius

[u]Warpaint
[/u]Lexa's famous warpaint (thanks to whoever invented it!) was designed for Skyrim and brought into the game by myself. I edited the "femalenordwarpaint_01", since I didn't know how to make it into its own mod.
Just download the optional file and place it into "Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/character assets/tintmasks" and click "overwrite".
You'll be fine with that.

[u]How to install:[/u]
Just place the LexaFinished.jslot into "Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets" and go into your game.

To get her looks on a new character:
In the racemenu, when starting a new character, just click on Presets, press F9 (load preset) and select "LexaFinished" from the List.

To get her looks onto your current character:
Open the console (~) and type "showracemenu" to get into the racemenu. In the racemenu click on Presets, press F9 (load preset) and select "LexaFinished" from the List. Press "r" to finish customization and done!
author: holycrapitznad
